title: Val (Val Kilmer doc)
description:
Tig and Cheryl discuss Val Kilmer's autobiographical doc "Val," which features home video of the famously handsome (and difficult?) actor "goofing" with Tom Cruise, playing Batman, and falling in love. Meanwhile, Cheryl lists the ingredients in a "Roy Rogers" and Tig gives Cheryl notes on how she intros each episode! It's a hilarious episode you won't want to miss! *this episode spills beans* get merch at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com
